attributes.action: provide a tax allowance for the offset of the cost of oil, gas and petrol for workers in the oil and gas industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, propose that the government applies a tax reduction/allowance to the members of the oil and gas service industry, with regards to workers in the offshore oil and gas exploration and production industries to offset the costs of oil, Gas and Petrol used by these individuals.
Many other employees in other sectors are given discounts or non taxable 'perks' on products and services relating to their industries/services.
Without the hard work and dedication of oil industry employees, often in severe and dangerous conditions with a great sacrifice to our family life, the infrastructure and economy of the United Kingdom would be severly affected, yet we are taxed at the same level as every other consumer on these fuels.
